oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Looking into the Famous Hall of Pillars, Temple of Karnak, Upper Egypt.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Colonnade at the Karnak Temple Complex. The obelisk of Temple of Karnak is visible in the foreground.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Antiquities
Hieroglyphics; Men;Temples; Tombs & sepulchral monuments
colonnades; columns (architectural elements); obelisks (monumental pillars)
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Underwood & Underwood Egypt Stereoviews; Stereoscopic Photographs Collection; Rare Books and Special Collections Library; American University in Cairo
